<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_518</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_518</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Laboratorio de Geometría</string>
            <string language="en">Geometry laboratory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrielabor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Laboratoire de la géométrie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Laboratório da geometria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Laboratorio della geometria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εργαστήριο γεωμετρίας</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones algunos ejemplos de construcciones geométricas, utilizando regla y cartabón, papiroflexia y pantógrafo. Las simulaciones ofrecen la posibilidad de experimentar sobre los problemas propuestos.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to show some examples of geometric constructions that can be carried out with a ruler and set square, paper folding and a pantograph. The simulations allow the student to experiment with the suggested problems.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">experimentación</string>
            <string language="en">experimentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cartabón</string>
            <string language="en">set square</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">regla</string>
            <string language="en">ruler</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">papiroflexia</string>
            <string language="en">paper folding</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, einige Beispiele der geometrischen Aufbauten zu zeigen, 
die mit einem Tabellierprogramm- und Setquadrat, Papierfalte und einem
Pantographen durchgeführt werden können. Die Simulationen 
erlauben dem Kursteilnehmer, mit den vorgeschlagenen Problemen zu 
experimentieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de montrer quelques exemples des constructions 
géométriques qui peuvent être effectuées avec une place de grille 
de tabulation et de positionnement, le pliage de papier et un 
pantographe. Les simulations permettent à l'étudiant 
d'expérimenter avec les problèmes suggérés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações mostrar 
alguns exemplos das construções geométricas que podem ser 
realizadas com um quadrado da régua e do jogo, dobradura do papel e 
um pantograph. As simulações permitem que o estudante 
experimente com os problemas sugeridos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
mostrare alcuni esempi delle costruzioni geometriche che possono 
essere effettuate con una squadra a triangolo e del righello, la 
piegatura della carta e un pantografo. Le simulazioni permettono
che l'allievo sperimenti con i problemi suggeriti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εμφανίσει μερικά παραδείγματα των γεωμετρικών κατασκευών 
που μπορούν να πραγματοποιηθούν με έναν κυβερνήτη και ένα 
τετράγωνο συνόλου, το δίπλωμα εγγράφου και pantograph. Οι
προσομοιώσεις επιτρέπουν στο σπουδαστή για να πειραματιστούν με τα
προτεινόμενα προβλήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experimentieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellen Sie Quadrat ein</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tabellierprogramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Papierfalte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expérimentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">placez la place</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grille de tabulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pliage de papier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">experimentação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ajuste o quadrado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">régua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dobradura de papel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esperimento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la squadra a triangolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">righello</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">piegatura di carta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πειραματισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καθορισμένο τετράγωνο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυβερνήτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωμετρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δίπλωμα εγγράφου</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
